text:
"No Time to Die" is an upcoming 2021 spy movie. It is twenty-fifth movie in the "James Bond" series. It is to be produced by Eon Productions for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Universal Pictures. The movie will have Daniel Craig in his fifth and final performance as fictional MI6 agent James Bond. It is directed by Cary Joji Fukunaga. The movie will also star Ralph Fiennes, Naomie Harris, Rami Malek, Léa Seydoux, Christoph Waltz, Ben Whishaw and Jeffrey Wright.
Billie Eilish performed and released the official theme of the movie in February 2020.
The movie will be released on 3 April 2021 in the United Kingdom and on 8 April 2021 worldwide.
